entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Rain showers or a few flurries this evening and after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
